import sys

def get_number(num, count):
    start = num
    if num == 0:
        start = 10
    for i in range(count - 1):
        start = (start * 10) + num
    return start


test_cases = int(sys.stdin.readline())

for counter in range(test_cases):
    candles_count = sys.stdin.readline()
    candles_count = candles_count.split(' ')
    candles_count = [int(i) for i in candles_count]
    first_smallest = 0
    j = 1
    while j < 10:
        if first_smallest == 0:
            if candles_count[j] <= candles_count[first_smallest]:
                first_smallest = j
        else:
            if candles_count[j] < candles_count[first_smallest]:
                first_smallest = j
        j += 1
    number = get_number(first_smallest, candles_count[first_smallest] + 1)
    print number
